import java.util.Scanner;

class Mangalyaan2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
		int t = s.nextInt();
		for(int i=0; i<t; i++){
			int n = s.nextInt();
			int p = s.nextInt();
			int a[] = new int[n];
			int count=0;
			for(int j=0; j<n; j++){
				a[j] = s.nextInt();
				if(a[j] >= p){
					count++;
				}
			}
			System.out.println(count);
		}

	}

}
